pages.title: Blizz
pages.text: The Blizz is a mob that spawns in cold biomes. It has 10 hearts and deals 3.5 hearts of damage at close range. It shoots projectiles which deal 2.5 hearts of damage and apply the Chilled effect. It has a chance to drop Blizz Cubes, which can be crafted or pulverized into Blizz Powder.

pages.title: Blizz
pages.text: Chilled: Decreases movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 0.4 seconds per level.

pages.title: Behavior
pages.text: The blizz is a standoffish elemental that rains projectiles upon its foes. It will fly above its target and spawn falling projectiles in an area around it. If close enough, it will hover in circles above its target.

pages.title: Strategy
pages.text: The easiest way to deal with the blizz is with a ranged weapon. In a melee fight, it is best to directly face the blizz and tank the damage in order to get within melee range.
